meanings.definition: A person who launches a counterattack.
meanings.sent1: The brave counterattacker swiftly responded to the enemy's attack.
meanings.sent2: The counterattacker defended their territory from the invading forces.
meanings.sent3: The counterattacker decided to fight back with courage and determination.
meanings.sent4: In the chess game of life, she was the counterattacker, always ready to defend.
meanings.sent5: The counterattacker's strategy was to strike back decisively and protect their people.

meanings.definition: To act in opposition or retaliation to an attack.
meanings.sent1: She chose to counterattack when her opponent made a move.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to counterattack after being pushed back by the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The cat counterattacked playfully when the dog tried to steal its toy.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a sharp sword, ready to counterattack any criticism.
meanings.sent5: The flowers counterattacked the weeds by growing stronger and more beautiful.
